p: There are some limitations in this study. Part of the cases did not obtain available genotypes, and hence, sensitive methods may need to be explored to improve genotyping success rate. We observed that several factors are associated with HIVDR and then large sample size will be required to ensure the accuracy of this conclusion. In order to better apprehend and evaluate the prevalence of acquired HIVDR in this area, attention should be devoted to the prevalence of drug resistance in ART-na√Øve HIV-1 infected patients.
